attributes.action: Give all British service personnel the freedom to fire when they feel nessecary whilst in a war zone and provide them with whatever equipment they require, whatever the cost may be to eneble them to do the job properly!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British service men and women are being hauled before courts to face charges relating to offences that have happened while they were serving in Iraq or Afghanistan while AT WAR. They are doing their duty for their country and putting their lives on the line for the sake of a war that should never have been! They also need the equipment that is being denied to them, at the cost to their lives. They need an unlimited supply of vehicles, weapons, ammunition and armour!!! Sign the petition to get the government to provide that!!!!
